<!-- Valentine's Day Website Project - Progress Tracking -->

## Project Overview
React-based Valentine's Day proposal website with 6 sequential interactive stages, galaxy theme, and smooth animations.

## Project Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [x] Scaffold React + Vite project
- [x] Install dependencies (framer-motion for animations)
- [x] Create galaxy background component with stars and shooting stars
- [x] Build Stage 1: Story Timeline
- [x] Build Stage 2: Catch the Hearts game
- [x] Build Stage 3: Choose Your Future story
- [x] Build Stage 4: Puzzle Unlock
- [x] Build Stage 5: Night Sky Mode
- [x] Build Stage 6: Final Valentine Question (space to pink transition)
- [x] Test complete flow and animations
- [x] Update README with project details

## Technical Stack
- React with Vite
- TypeScript
- Framer Motion for animations
- CSS for galaxy/space theme
- State management for stage progression

## Theme Requirements
- Dark galaxy background with stars ✅
- Shooting stars (orange-tipped lines) ✅
- Smooth page transitions ✅
- Final transition from space theme to pink ✅
- "No" button that runs away from cursor ✅

## Project Status: COMPLETE ✅

All stages have been implemented and are ready for customization. 
The dev server is running at http://localhost:5173/
